QuestData.Title: A Gathering of Champions
QuestData.Description:
King Wrynn has called for an audience with the Alliance leaders in Stormwind.
Your presence at the meeting has been specifically requested. The gathering will be held at the embassy.
Come speak with me when you arrive in Stormwind, I'll be waiting with the others.
Do hurry, $n. It would be ill-advised to keep the king waiting...
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Master Mathias Shaw in Stormwind.
